Image.Alt: Eight Sea Scouts stand at attention in front of tents. They are in their uniforms. The photo is black-and-white.
Image.Caption: Sea Scout Troop 153 at Roll Call.
Image.Notes: It is not known for sure if this picture was taken during the camporee described in the article. However, the date of the photo is 1944. There are also eight Sea Scouts - the same amount as in the article. While it isn't 100% certain, there is a high probability that this photo is from this camporee.
